title: Youâ€™re Losing Me (From The Vault)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:05.02] You say, "I don't understand, " and I say, "I know you don't"
[00:11.00] 
[00:14.38] We thought a cure would come through in time, now, I fear it won't
[00:20.70] 
[00:23.63] Remember lookin' at this room, we loved it 'cause of the light
[00:30.75] 
[00:33.18] Now, I just sit in the dark and wonder if it's time
[00:39.23] 
[00:41.55] Do I throw out everything we built or keep it?
[00:46.43] I'm getting tired even for a phoenix
[00:49.87] Always risin' from the ashes
[00:52.67] Mendin' all her gashes
[00:54.85] You might just have dealt the final blow
[01:01.66] Stop, you're losin' me
[01:06.16] Stop, you're losin' me
[01:10.65] Stop, you're losin' me
[01:15.36] I can't find a pulse
[01:17.02] My heart won't start anymore
[01:21.00] For you
[01:23.68] 
[01:26.53] 'Cause you're losin' me
[01:29.87] 
[01:38.45] Every morning, I glared at you with storms in my eyes
[01:44.14] 
[01:47.64] How can you say that you love someone you can't tell is dying?
[01:53.74] 
[01:57.08] I sent you signals and bit my nails down to the quick
[02:03.49] 
[02:06.33] My face was gray, but you wouldn't admit that we were sick
[02:14.63] And the air is thick with loss and indecision
[02:19.54] I know my pain is such an imposition
[02:22.80] Now, you're runnin' down the hallway
[02:25.88] And you know what they all say
[02:27.98] You don't know what you got until it's gone
[02:34.62] Stop, you're losin' me
[02:39.43] Stop, you're losin' me
[02:44.02] Stop, you're losin' me
[02:48.31] I can't find a pulse
[02:50.39] My heart won't start anymore
[02:54.21] For you
[02:57.61] 
[02:59.73] 'Cause you're losin' me
[03:04.57] 'Cause you're losin' me
[03:07.25] Stop (stop) 'cause you're losin' me
[03:11.12] My heart won't start anymore ('cause you're losin' me)
[03:15.72] My heart won't start anymore ('cause you're losin' me)
[03:20.48] How long could we be a sad song
[03:24.49] 'Til we were too far gone to bring back to life?
[03:28.30] I gave you all my best me's, my endless empathy
[03:33.73] And all I did was bleed as I tried to be the bravest soldier
[03:39.76] Fighting in only your army
[03:42.06] Frontlines, don't you ignore me
[03:44.19] I'm the best thing at this party
[03:46.72] (You're losin' me)
[03:49.08] And I wouldn't marry me either
[03:51.08] A pathological people-pleaser
[03:53.56] Who only wanted you to see her
[03:56.13] And I'm fadin', thinkin'
[03:57.93] Do something, babe, say something (say something)
[04:02.44] Lose something, babe, risk something (you're losin' me)
[04:07.07] Choose something, babe, I got nothing (got nothing)
[04:11.15] To believe
[04:13.59] Unless you're choosin' me
[04:19.38] You're losin' me
[04:21.83] Stop (stop, stop), you're losin' me
[04:26.56] Stop (stop, stop), you're losin' me
[04:31.10] I can't find a pulse
[04:32.87] My heart won't start anymore
[04:34.29]
